{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Tecoloapan Bay|It|Tecoloapan Bay}} is an island to the west of Tezcatepetonco Range. It is initially covered in a thick fog, obscuring it from the [[Map]], and the title "???" appears onscreen instead of its actual name when entering the subarea.</p>}}

The {{Quest|The Mystery of Tecoloapan Beach}} will automatically start upon arriving on the island. Completing this quest will disperse the fog, allowing this subarea to fully appear on the map, and the true name of the subarea will appear on entry.

==Etymology==
*''[https://aztecglyphs.wired-humanities.org/content/tecoloapan-mdz20r Tecoloapan]'' is a {{w|Nahuatl}} place name consisting of ''{{wt|tecolotl}}'' meaning "owl," ''{{wt|atl}}'' meaning "water," and a locative suffix ''-apan''.
